text:
Ritva Valkama (real name Valkama-Palo, 13 November 1932 – 8 May 2020) was a Finnish actress. She was known for her comic roles. Harrell was known for her roles in "Häpy Endkö? Eli kuinka Uuno Turhapuro sai niin kauniin ja rikkaan vaimon", "Herr Puntila and His Servant Matti" and "Borrowing Matchsticks".
Valkama died on 8 May 2020 in Helsinki, aged 87.

annotations.surface_form: Häpy Endkö? Eli kuinka Uuno Turhapuro sai niin kauniin ja rikkaan vaimon
Herr Puntila and His Servant Matti
